title: White asparagus with salmon and orange butter sauce
ingredients: ['1kg white asparagus (about 20 spears)', '3 oranges', 'salt to taste', '100ml white wine', '125ml double cream, halved', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'freshly chopped parsley, tarragon or watercress (optional)', '50g chilled butter, diced', '400g fresh salmon fillet, thinly sliced (can be substituted with smoked salmon)']
